title: ACI Reactivation Protocol - COMPLETE
executive_intent: Reality before learning. Learning before capital.

phase_b_perception_sanity.verdict: No epistemic anomalies. Observations confirmed real.

actions_enabled: FINN allowed to resume regret attribution

ceio_postmortem.root_cause: No scheduled daemon for continuous price updates. Alpaca SIP requires paid subscription. yfinance rate limited.
ceio_postmortem.why_alerting_failed: No freshness monitoring daemon. DATA_BLACKOUT implemented reactively.
ceio_postmortem.preventive_control: Created spot_price_ingest.py and alpaca_iex_ingest.py. DATA_BLACKOUT protocol enforced.

standing_order: Reality before learning. Learning before capital.

closing_statement.text: ACI Reactivation Protocol COMPLETE. Three-phase gated recovery executed successfully. DATA_BLACKOUT cleared. System returned to OPERATIONAL status. All primary assets have fresh prices. FINN cleared to resume learning with calibration gates enforced.
